name: Valley of Death
description:
Valley Of Death

"It's been a week ,I have'nt seen my family.I don't know if im going to live or die,but I ain't giving up so easily.Things are about to change pretty soon."

A bio-terror attack in USA leads to establishments of quarrantine zones followed by mass evacuations.The game circles around the story of one man who could not be evacuated and suspected to be infected by the virus is hunted down by the federation.The man has lost contact with his family ,he tries his best to survive and escape the quarrantine zone ,so that he can once again re-unite with his beloved family.The attacker who has committed an act of war against the United States is still unknown.While trying to survive and escape the federation the man discovers classified documents and intel about the attacker,it's no one else but a traitor in the nation.

Take the role of the man and help him reveal the traitor and escape the death zone ,so he can once again re-unite with his family.

The game is an FPS-Adventure game.This is our first game we've made and it's completely developed just by one man ,Craig Gomes.

"We hope people will love this game,just as much as I loved making my first commercial game." - Craig Gomes

"We at Armadyne are moving forward on making better games.We really want to take game development and your experience to a whole new level."-The Armadyne Team
